com.mousebird.maply
Class GestureHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.mousebird.maply.GestureHandler

public class GestureHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Implements the various gestures we need and handles conflict between them.

This is used by the MaplyController to deal with gestures on Android. If you want to mess with this, be sure to subclass the MaplyController and create your own subclass of this.

Method Detail

withinBounds

public static boolean withinBounds(com.mousebird.maply.MapView mapView,
                                   Point2d frameSize,
                                   Point3d newPos,
                                   Point2d[] bounds)
Check that a given position will be within the given bounds. This is used by the various gestures for bounds checking.

Parameters:
newPos - Position we're to check.
bounds - Bounding box, probably from the maplyControl.
Returns:
true if the new point is within the valid area.
